```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + geom_jitter() #aes for the aesthetics, what we put in the visual representation, function in Y-axis always, always vertical
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity)) + geom_boxplot()
```
